short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Solar calculator for residential, commercial and industrial use.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The ultimate tool for calculating solar system size tailored for residential, commercial, and industrial applications. This easy-to-use extension helps you determine the optimal solar panel requirements for your specific energy needs.

Features:
1. Accurate solar system sizing for any type of property.
2. Support for residential, commercial, and industrial energy calculations.
3. Simple and intuitive interface for quick calculations.
4. Helps optimize energy efficiency and cost savings.

Perfect for homeowners, businesses, and professionals in the renewable energy industry. Start planning your sustainable energy solutions today with the Solar System Size Calculator
